description: Automated data science pipeline featuring: async web scraping, ML analysis (TF-IDF, topic modeling, clustering), and citation network tracking. Includes Archimedes dataset: 6,581 unique papers (1972+) from Shepard & Metzler (1971) and Vandenberg & Kuse (1978) citation networks via OpenAlex API
subtitle: ML-powered research pipeline with OpenAlex citation network analysis (6,581 papers from foundational mental rotation literature)
title: Mental Rotation Research

description: NLP and network analysis examining the 75% conceptual overlap between Jordan Peterson's PragerU video "Who Is Teaching Your Kids?" and Anders Breivik's terrorist manifesto. Uses TF-IDF vectorization, n-gram analysis, and network co-occurrence to reveal rhetorical strategies and ideological transmission patterns.
subtitle: Computational analysis of ideological rhetoric and radicalization pathways
title: Counterterrorism NLP Analysis
